mapper.select: SELECT CONTESTTYPE FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBEREMAIL = #{email} AND PAYED = FALSE
SELECT ID,TITLE,CONTESTTYPE,COMPANY,SERVICEINFO,SECTOR,IDEA,BRIEFING FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBEREMAIL = #{value} AND PAYED = FALSE
SELECT TITLE, CONTESTTYPE, COMPANY, SERVICEINFO, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FIRSTPRIZE, SECONDPRIZE, THIRDPRIZE, BENNER, HIGHTLIGHT,ENDCONTEST, VIEWS FROM CONTEST WHERE ID = #{value}

SELECT TITLE, CONTESTTYPE, COMPANY, SERVICEINFO, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FIRSTPRIZE, SECONDPRIZE, THIRDPRIZE, BENNER, HIGHTLIGHT,ENDCONTEST, VIEWS FROM CONTEST
WHERE ENDDATE > CURDATE()
WHERE CURDATE() > ENDDATE AND ENDCONTEST = 0
WHERE ENDCONTEST = 1
ORDERBY STARTDATE, SHOW LIMIT #{startlist}, #{listsize}

SELECT CONTEST.ID, CONTEST.TITLE, COUNT(WORK.CONTEST_ID), DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE,CONTEST.STARTDATE) FROM CONTEST LEFT JOIN WORK ON CONTEST.ID = WORK.CONTEST_ID GROUP BY WORK.CONTEST_ID
ORDER BY COUNT(WORK.CONTEST_ID)
ORDER BY CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE DESC
ORDER BY CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC
LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK(CONTEST_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, CONTENT) VALUES(#{contest_id},#{email},#{content})
